favourite.article: If God makes you happy you've given your best authority to our Savior God. No one can make your own decision but God gives you a reason why you live. God bless to all.
GOD HAS SAVED ME BECAUSE HE IS IN LOVE WITH ME. HE WANTED ME TO BE HAPPY. I AM NO LONGER A PART OF ANY CORRUPTION. I AM ONLY A PART OF GOD, AND THAT IS LOVE.
Thank You Lord for saving me from the world. I love You, Lord. I love You. I'll never go back anymore.
What grace it is to obey and declare, no, no, no, no, no, I'll never go back anymore. Oh Lord, no longer I.
Thank God that He saved us and rescued out from the world. God separated us from any corruption that belongs in this world, He guided us in a way to enjoy Him and touch Him. PRAISE THE LORD! AMEN.
Amen. I'll never go back anymore. He saved me from the world. Lord Jesus, I love You.
